accordion.title: How do I create an account?
accordion.subtitle: Download the Uber app from the App Store or Google Play, then create an account with your email address and mobile phone number. A payment method is also needed before you can request a ride.

accordion.title: Is Uber available in my city?
accordion.subtitle: You can find Uber in more than 10,000 cities around the world.
